name: part_005
file: tmp_【#天音かなた2周年LIVE】無料 3DLIVE 「リベンジ」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Revenge＂【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [Dji-ehIz5_k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence featuring text announcements for a special report and a new original song production.
Short transition animation leading into the live performance.
Amane Kanata performs 'Kaikai Kitan' on stage with a red-themed visual background.
The stage lights dim for a brief interlude before the next song begins.
Amane Kanata begins performing 'Gunjou' on a stage set that mimics city buildings at night.

subtitles.original: 特報
subtitles.english: Special Report

subtitles.original: 作詞 作曲
subtitles.english: Lyrics / Composition

subtitles.original: 天音かなた
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata

subtitles.original: 編曲
subtitles.english: Arrangement

subtitles.original:
Numa
代表作：「廻廻奇譚」「ドラマツルギー」「アウトサイダー」
subtitles.english:
Numa
Notable works: "Kaikai Kitan", "Dramaturgy", "Outsider"

subtitles.original: オリジナル曲 制作決定
subtitles.english: Original Song Production Decided

subtitles.original: 有象無象 人の成り 虚勢 心象 人外 物の怪みたいだ
subtitles.english: Various people, in human form, bluffs, mental images, like monsters.

subtitles.original: 虚心坦懐 命宿し あとはぱっぱらぱんな中身なき人間
subtitles.english: Open-hearted, life dwells within, then it's just empty humans.

subtitles.original: 寄せる期待 不平等な人生 才能もない 大抵 非日常が
subtitles.english: Expectations gather, an unequal life, no talent, mostly the extraordinary...

subtitles.original: 怨親平等に没個性 辿る記憶 僕に居場所などないから
subtitles.english: Impartial to friends and foes, losing individuality, tracing memories, for I have no place.

subtitles.original: 夢の狭間で泣いてないで どんな顔すればいいか分かってる
subtitles.english: Don't cry in the gap between dreams, I know what kind of face I should make.

subtitles.original: だけどまだ応えてくれよ
subtitles.english: But please, still answer me.

subtitles.original: 闇を祓って 闇を祓って 夜の帳が下りたら合図だ
subtitles.english: Exorcise the darkness, exorcise the darkness, it's the signal when night falls.

subtitles.original: 相対して 廻る環状線 戯言などは 吐き捨ていけと
subtitles.english: Facing each other, the revolving loop, cast aside all the nonsense and go.

subtitles.original: まだ止めないで まだ止めないで 誰よりも聡く在る街に生まれし
subtitles.english: Don't stop yet, don't stop yet, born in a city that's smarter than anyone.

subtitles.original: この正体を 今はただ 呪い呪われた僕の未来を創造して
subtitles.english: This identity, for now, just create the future of my cursed self.

subtitles.original: 走って 転んで 消えない痛み抱いては
subtitles.english: Running, falling, embracing the pain that won't fade.

subtitles.original: 世界が待ってる この一瞬を
subtitles.english: The world is waiting for this moment.

subtitles.original: 叙情的感情が揺らいでいくバグ 従順に従った欠陥の罰
subtitles.english: A bug where emotions waver, the punishment of a flaw that followed obediently.

subtitles.original: 死守選択しかない愛に無常気 声も出せないまま
subtitles.english: Indifferent to love with only a choice to defend, unable to make a sound.

subtitles.original: 傀儡な誓いの街百鬼夜行 数珠繋ぎなこの果てまでも
subtitles.english: Night parade in a city of puppet oaths, even to this linked end.

subtitles.original: 極楽往生 現実蹴って 命を投げ出さないで
subtitles.english: Rebirth in paradise, kicking reality, don't throw your life away.

subtitles.original: 内の脆さに浸って どんな顔すればいいか分かんないよ
subtitles.english: Immersed in internal fragility, I don't know what face I should make.

subtitles.original: 今はただ応えてくれよ
subtitles.english: For now, just answer me.

subtitles.original: 五常を解いて 五常を解いて 不確かな声を紡ぐイデア
subtitles.english: Unravel the constants, unravel the constants, the idea that weaves uncertain voices.

subtitles.original: 相殺して 廻る感情線 その先に今 立ち上がる手を
subtitles.english: Offsetting, the revolving line of emotion, to the hand that rises up now.

subtitles.original: ただ追いかけて ただ追いかけて 誰よりも強く在りたいと願う
subtitles.english: Just chasing, just chasing, wishing to be stronger than anyone.

subtitles.original: 君の運命すら 今はただ 仄暗い夜の底に深く深く落ち込んで
subtitles.english: Even your fate, for now, just sinking deep into the bottom of the dim night.

subtitles.original: 不格好に見えたかい これが今の僕なんだ
subtitles.english: Did I look unsightly? This is who I am now.

subtitles.original: 何者にもなれやしないだけの 屍を嗤えよ
subtitles.english: Sneer at the corpse that just can't become anything.

subtitles.original: 目の前の全てから 逃げることさえやめた
subtitles.english: I've even stopped running away from everything in front of me.

subtitles.original: イメージを繰り返し 想像の先をいけと
subtitles.english: Repeating images, tell me to go beyond imagination.

subtitles.original: 闇を祓って 闇を祓って 夜の帳が下りたら合図だ
subtitles.english: Exorcise the darkness, exorcise the darkness, it's the signal when night falls.

subtitles.original: 相対して 廻る環状線 戯言などは 吐き捨ていけと
subtitles.english: Facing each other, the revolving loop, cast aside all the nonsense and go.

subtitles.original: まだ止めないで まだ止めないで 誰よりも聡く在る街に生まれし
subtitles.english: Don't stop yet, don't stop yet, born in a city that's smarter than anyone.

subtitles.original: この正体を 今はただ 呪い呪われた僕の未来を創造して
subtitles.english: This identity, for now, just create the future of my cursed self.

subtitles.original: 走って 転んで 消えない痛み抱いては
subtitles.english: Running, falling, embracing the pain that won't fade.

subtitles.original: 世界が待ってる この一瞬を
subtitles.english: The world is waiting for this moment.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼、いつもの様に 過ぎる日々に あくびが出る
subtitles.english: Ah, yawning at the days passing by as usual.

subtitles.original: さんざめく夜、越え 今日も 渋谷の街に朝が降る
subtitles.english: Crossing the bustling night, morning falls on Shibuya again today.

subtitles.original: どこか虚しいような そんな気持ち
subtitles.english: A feeling that is somehow empty.

subtitles.original: つまらないな
subtitles.english: How boring.

subtitles.original: でもそれでいい そんなもんさ これでいい
subtitles.english: But that's fine. That's just how it is. This is fine.

subtitles.original: (知らず知らず隠してた) (本当の声を響かせてよ、ほら)
subtitles.english: (Hidden away without knowing) (Let your true voice ring out, look)

subtitles.original: (見ないフリしていたっても) (確かにそこに居る)
subtitles.english: (Even if you pretend not to see) (It's definitely there)
